category: news
title: "Drones, automatic counting tools and artificial neural networks in wildlife population censusing"
excerpt: "In 96% of 343 cases, drone counting was successful. 18.8% of non-breeding birds and 3.6% of breeding birds exhibited adverse reactions: in the former, the birds were flushed, whereas the latter attempted to attack the drone."
